website_summaries.verdict: One can probably never go wrong with a shoe as classic as the Puma Suede. In 2017, Puma released a new rendition of this iconic silhouette through the Puma Suede Classic Natural Warmth, which is toned down a little bit with natural warm colors in an elegant water-resistant suede upper and a gum rubber outsole.Beyond its old-school yet fashion-forward façade is a top-notch quality that amazes sneakerheads and casual users across generations. Overall, this rendition is considered by many as another hit release from Puma. It is comfortable, stylish, functional, and affordable.
pros: Some purchasers recognized that the Puma Suede Classic Natural Warmth seems to be well put together with exceptional quality
Many reviewers commended the superb comfort of this low-top Puma shoe
In particular, a handful of them said that the sole is comfy
One pleased reviewer liked that this shoe is “warm which is going to be key for the winter.”
A few reviewers noted that the suede looks still fine despite getting caught in the rain
This shoe looks great and stylish, according to several buyers
They liked the classic and sporty look of it
The Puma Suede Classic Natural Warmth is a good value for money, according to a small number of purchasers
The majority of reviewers highly recommends this version of the Puma Suede
cons: One reviewer said that his only complaint on the Puma Suede Classic Natural Warmth is that the suede material seemed to wear out quickly
A few buyers said that this suede shoe does not have enough supportive padding

customer_reviews.title: Great look, quality, and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and fit. Don't hesitate on these. They look great and are very comfortable after conforming to your foot for a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Lito

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but a little small
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these. They were cute. Although they were a little small. We had a conversation about buying a shoe horn to strech the leather. Hopefully it will help.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Royals Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker even in the rain super stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the pairs of sneakers I use daily for work they are holding up pretty well considering what I do for a living very comfortable I love my Pumas
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, and
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Vans for a while, but I think I’ll be transitioning to these Pumas. Very comfortable, and contemporary
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat small for me. Also, not enough supportive padding for my taste. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Bit too big
customer_reviews.text: These are the same size as another set of Puma sneakers that are half a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: 乇乂丅尺卂丅卄工匚匚

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute style, returned them way too narrow for size 14
customer_reviews.author: QT

customer_reviews.title: Sweet shoes
customer_reviews.text: This product fits as it should. But signs of long term storage is thos it’s easily fixable. I’m happy with my perches an can’t compane.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase; the old suede never lets down; would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Luis alberto Echavez

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Loved my other pumas but these are not wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cripps

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s so comfortable I need another pair but it not available
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: I need a smaller one, 7.
customer_reviews.text: I need a smaller one, 7.5 I prepared the one i jave for retuen
customer_reviews.author: Mahran Alkhalil

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Suede Classic Natural Warmth Sneaker
product_meta.description: Definitely the most well-known and popular of all PUMA shoes, this sport classic is one of the shoe that built the success of the german sports brand. Available in nude and dark colours, perfect for your winter wardrobe
